Model Classes¶

These are the functions that my project provides

class models.Package.Package(id, address, city, state, zip, deadline, mass, notes='')¶

A model of a package to better store and retrieve package attributes

print()¶

Helper printing function for the package model

print_verbose()¶

Helper function for printing representation of package with all package attributes

class models.PackageTable.PackageTable(initial_capacity=10)¶

An abstract data structure that uses a chaining hash table to store package data

get_bucket(item)¶

Helper function to get the bucket index of the given item

Parameters:

item (int) – Package ID

Returns:

Bucket Index

Return type:

int

insert_or_update(key, value)¶

Insert a package into table or update existing entry

Parameters:

  • key (int) – The ID of the package to be added

  • value (models.Package) – The package object to be added

Returns:

bool indicating success or failure of insert/update

Return type:

bool

print_table()¶

Helper function to print the current contents of the table

Prints all buckets and their content displaying the package ID and Address for human readability

remove(key)¶

Remove by package ID

Parameters:

key (int) – Package ID

search(key)¶

Search by package ID

Parameters:

key (int) – Package ID

Returns:

Package object or None if key does not exist

Return type:

models.Package

class models.Place.Place(id, name, address, zip)¶

A model of a place to better store and retrieve place attributes

print()¶

Helper printing function for the place model

class models.Truck.Truck(name)¶

A model of a truck to facilitate packaging simulation per project requirements

can_add_package()¶

Helper function to check if more packages can be added or if the truck is at max capacity

Returns:

Return type:

bool

current_capacity()¶

Helper function to get the current number of packages in the truck

Returns:

Number of packages loaded in the truck

Return type:

int

deliver_package(package_id, package_deadline, delivery_time)¶

Deliver a package, unloads package, adds package to the delivered packages, set package delivery time and status

Parameters:

  • package_deadline (datetime) – Deadline given package_id needs to be delivered by

  • delivery_time (datetime) – Time the package is delivered

  • package_id (int) – Unique ID of the package to deliver

load_package(package)¶

Load a package into the truck

Does not allow for packages to go over the preset truck capacity

Parameters:

package (models.Package) –

print()¶

Helper printing function for the truck model

print_packages()¶

Helper printing function for the truck’s package list

unload_package(package)¶

Unload a package off of the truck

Parameters:

package (models.Package) –
